description: 1997 Honda Civic Ferio (EK3)  1500cc. This vehicle comes with Anti-lock braking system, Eco Mode, Builtin Display, Remote Player, Electric mirrors, Power door locks, Power steering, Power windows, Rear window defroster,A/C: Front, Airbag: Driver, Airbag: Passenger, AM/FM stereo, CD audio system, Cup holders,  Alloy wheels, Tinted glass features. This is a Petrol vehicle with Automatic transmission.  Grey Fabric interior. The price is Rs.1850000 or Highest Offer and the mileage is 22000KMs. Superb running condition. No due repairs. All service and maintenance done timely. Carefully used vehicle. selling due to upgrade.
name: Honda Civic EK3 1997
